Pre-Game Insights: Coach Patrick Mabedi emphasized the importance of redeeming pride and giving a gift to Malawian fans on Mother's Day.
Senegal's interim coach Pape Thiaw acknowledged the challenge of playing away from home.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match holds significance on Mother's Day, adding emotional weight to the game.
The Flames are under pressure to perform well in their remaining qualifiers to qualify for the Afcon finals.
